RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECOND TO NO ONE was bumped at the start, sprinted to the front soon thereafter, set all the pace, widened into the stretch and prevailed under a brisk hand ride in the four path. SWELTER vied for the early lead three wide, dropped back a bit entering the turn, was in tight between rivals at the quarter pole then came on again late in the five path in a determined effort. DOMI trailed outside and had a mild late rally in the seven path. MINDSHIP Q drifted out bumping the winner at the start, was a forward factor along the inside down the backstretch, altered course to the five path nearing the top of the stretch, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then weakened in the final stages. OUTSLEWTHEM chased the winner four wide into the stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Mindship Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted, bumped start, inside speed, angled 5p top lane, weakend

ENTRY.NAME: Second to No One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, quick lead, drew clear upper stretch, hand ridden

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed outside, mild rally late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Swelter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, in tight 1/4 pole, dropped back, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Outslewthem
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 4 wide, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD ON YA allowed to settle, closed willingly four wide through the turn and into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and drew clear under mild right handed urging late. DISCLOSURE trailed for nearly a half, closed fast outside rivals six wide through deep stretch and finished second best. SO DIALED IN vied for the lead three wide through the turn, put a head on front briefly at the top of the stretch then was outfinished. AGNELLO'S DREAM sprinted up the inside to gain a narrow advantage before a quarter, set the pace to the three eighths pole, kept on into the stretch, shifted out to the five path and was outfinished. BIG TRUCK failed to menace. IRISH UNITY pressed the pace two wide for three furlongs, made the lead, maintained a narrow advantage to the top of the stretch then weakened late. THRU THE VINE was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Disclosure
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, closed fast, 6 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Thru the Vine
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrow lead inside early, headed 3/8 pole, kept on, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Unity
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, led 3/8pole, headed top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, led briefly top lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Big Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Good On Ya
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly 4w into stretch, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 16100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 1. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODLAND WALK chased the leader for a half, closed rapidly two wide to make the lead in the four path before the furlong marker and drew off under confident handling. MAKING ME CRAZY trailed into the stretch, rallied determinedly three wide in the five path through the final furlong and got up for second. TEMPLE TITAN broke in front and quickly opened a daylight lead, set the pace into the stretch then was outfinished. TWO GUNS went evenly. LAUDA SPEED failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Making Me Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied 3 wide 5path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Two Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, closed willingly, 2 wide, drew off, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Temple Titan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, daylight lead to lane, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 1. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOT A WILD BRAT was bumped at the start, pressed the pace three wide, surged late under strong handling and got up in the final strides. DANCIN' ROSIE broke alertly, set all the pace then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages while clear for second. CHLOES ANGEL had good early speed, two wide, dropped inside on the turn and finished with good courage along the rail. NORTHERN JOURNEY saved ground early, shifted to the three path in upper stretch and passed tiring rivals. KISSTHECROSS bore in bumping the winner at the start, moved closer outside rivals four wide on the turn then weakened. CAT'S RHYTHM had speed from the star, offered a mild bid three wide through the turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground early, shifted 3path, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2 wide, angled in turn, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin' Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, caught late stages

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked, dug in 3w, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Kissthecross
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, middle move, outside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Vigil Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 1. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Winners since May 1 Preferred)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOT YET CHARLIE away alertly, set all the pace while nicely rated and prevailed under right handed urging two wide. SAY HEY KID settled, began to rally in the four path in upper stretch, shifted in to the two path inside the sixteenth pole and was steadily cutting into the winners' advantage late. RUBINSTEIN never far back, finished determinedly four wide. NOBLE BEHAVIOR pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was outfinished while three wide. LEXATOGA saved ground and went evenly. HIGH POWERED was no factor. YOUVESAIDITALL was outrun. DEBDURITE drifted inward bumping RSAS WAY at the start, stalked the pace three wide for six furlong then weakened. ROSAS WAY was bumped at the start and no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led throughout, nicely rated, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lexatoga
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed 4path, angled in 2path late, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped rival start, stalked pace, 3 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rubinstein
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished determinedly 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: High Powered
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 1. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JETTIN PEGASUS unhurried early to be at the rear of the field, settled back to circle five wide in the turn laving the rail, loomed in upper stretch and was up in time under a drive down the lane. THE LAST APPLE sped to the lead shortly from the gates, controlled the pace to the top of the lane, responded when challenged in upper stretch and kept on well only to be caught late in the stretch. SHEZA POP STAR stalked the pacesetter through the turn, challenged in upper stretch and failed to get passed. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE raced mid-pack into the turn, dropped back on the bend and came again through the lane with late interest. CHECK OUT LINE reserved off the pace through the turn, made a mild bid in upper stretch and finished evenly. CITY SIGNS saved ground along the fence while well positioned in striking distance turning for home and flattened out in the drive. HIGH CUPPER raced wide throughout and never posed a threat. PSYCHOANALYST tracked the pace from three wide to late in the turn and gave way in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Jettin Pegasus
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled 5w,up in time

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: The Last Apple
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, responded, kept on, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, brief bid, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Pop Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid upper, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, came on late

ENTRY.NAME: Psychoanalyst
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3w, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: High Cupper
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOING IN STYLE away alertly, set all the pace while nicely rated and drew off under confident handling. TIMESATAPPIN trailed along the inside for a half, shifted outside entering the far turn, closed determinedly five then four wide through the stretch and got up for second under left handed urging. BLUNDER chased the winner and finished determinedly two wide under left handed urging. SERGEANT COUNTZLER had good early speed along the inside, dropped back on the far turn then came on again along the rail through the stretch. LAST COOKIE chased the winner three then two wide and was outfinished. DON'T CROSS JACK offered a mild bid three wide on the far turn then came up empty. FUNNY MAN close up into the second turn two wide, weakened weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Sergeant Countzler
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back 2nd turn, came again rail

ENTRY.NAME: Last Cookie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3-2wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Timesatappin
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed inside, angled out entering far turn, closed 4w, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Pelfrey Ruth Nicoletta Gerald Tait Bob Hertrich III Frederick and Blazing Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Going in Style
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, nicely rated, drew off, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Blunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, finished well, 2 wide, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Cross Jack
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Dolce Vita Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALSANAH reserved early, circled her field five wide through the stretch under left handed urging and was along in time. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN chased the pace for six furlongs, rallied two wide to make the lead in upper stretch, set the balance of the pace then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. WILDCAT DREAM was a sharp threat from the start and finished with good courage along the rail. BLACK FOREST sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. ROWDY DAISY offered a mild bid three wide into the second turn then came up empty. PENUMBRAS MAKER was no factor. ELIKA trailed from the start, lost contact with her field on the far turn, pulled up in upper stretch and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Elika
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, pulled up upper stretch, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, circled field, 5 wide left urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Penumbras Maker
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 2 wide, led lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Rowdy Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace upper stretch, outfinished
